definition: to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help

sentences.english: EHC handrails are approved by all major escalator handrail manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 依合斯扶手带经各扶梯生产厂商批准。

sentences.english: Located on a hill, a long escalator takes me up to what is actually only the ground floor.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔坐落在山上，长长的自动扶梯把我送到宝塔底层。

sentences.english: Step downstairs from Exit B, go straight and take the escalator downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 从B出口下地下，直行然后乘向下的扶梯。

sentences.english: Escalator: automatic lifts which take people up and down.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不想乘坐自动扶梯，我们走楼梯吧。

sentences.english: Order safety brushes for your escalator using EHC Global's online form.
sentences.chinese: 在线填写表格为您的扶梯定购安全刷。

sentences.english: Just because I fell down on the escalator that is so spiky.
sentences.chinese: 就是因为我在尖尖的电动扶梯梯级上跌了一下。

sentences.english: On escalators, stand to the right, walk to the left.
sentences.chinese: 乘电动扶梯时，站靠右，行靠左。

sentences.english: The capsules are stacked in pairs, with chrome ladders at their entrances.
sentences.chinese: 微型舱是两个叠在一起的，在进口处装有镀铬的扶梯。

sentences.english: Spread over four levels, the bookstore has both escalators and elevators available for easy movement around the store.
sentences.chinese: 店里四层都设有自动扶梯以及直梯方便读者四处浏览。

sentences.english: Jim and his gang hid in the dark behind these stairs.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他那一伙都藏在扶梯后面黑乎乎的地方。

sentences.english: The logic behind the "stand right, walk left" escalator etiquette seems obvious.
sentences.chinese: “左行右立”这种扶梯礼仪背后的逻辑显而易见。

sentences.english: B:Take the escalator and then go to the right.
sentences.chinese: 乘自动扶梯下去，然后往右转。

sentences.english: KONE is one of the leading companies in the global elevator and escalator business.
sentences.chinese: 通力是全球电梯和自动扶梯行业最大的公司之一。

sentences.english: KONE is one of the largest elevator and escalator companies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 通力是世界上最大电梯和扶梯提供商之一。

sentences.english: Shuanglong's stair-arm belt will bring a brand-new colour with your escalators .
sentences.chinese: 双龙扶手带为您的自动扶梯增添崭新的光彩。

sentences.english: That will give other people who are in a hurry the option of walking up the left-hand side of the escalator.
sentences.chinese: 这会让其他匆忙的人知道要走靠扶梯左边的过道。

definition: aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
